meanings.sent1: She always seems grumbly when she has to do chores.
meanings.sent2: The old man down the street is known for his grumbly nature.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked grumbly when it saw the rain outside.
meanings.sent4: The grumbly clouds overhead threatened a storm.
meanings.sent5: His grumbly voice echoed through the room, expressing his dissatisfaction.

meanings.sent1: The grumbly engine of the old car needed some fixing.
meanings.sent2: The grumbly thunder in the distance signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The grumbly sound of the train passing by made her sleepy.
meanings.sent4: The grumbly noise of the waterfall was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The grumbly purr of the cat comforted her during the storm.
